pullRequest.title: [IOTDB-1032]Refactor site/pom.xml and move v0.11 to 0.12 in all pom files
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR has two tasks:


Refactor site/pom.xml
Now we can use mvn compile -P site -pl site -P compile-site -P compile-site-0.11 -P compile-site-0.10 -P compile-site-0.9 -P compile-site-0.8 to compile the docs of all version.  (using less than 4GB memory)


move v0.11 to 0.12 in all pom files


(Do not use squash mand merge to merge this PR, as the two commit log records are meaningful)
This PR also fix JIRA 1032

commit.message: update how to compile the site

commit.message: remove download links of legacy versions
remove duplicated links in website; add -c parameter for cli in doc
